overview: - The original "Jesus Loves Me" Video for the first time ever on DVD!  - Plus BRAND NEW gentle and mellow versions of your favorite Sunday school classics.  - Featuring Jack and Scarlett in every video.  "Jesus Loves Me" (Original version)  "Peace Like A River" (Playtime mix)  "Deep and Wide" (Playtime mix)  "Joy Joy Joy" (Playtime mix)  "Happy and You Know It" (Playtime mix)
title: Listener Kids Jesus Loves Me
